trends: There have been no other sightings in Mt Pleasant
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsmy recollection is very sharp, although it was a long time ago. when i was 9 years old, we were visiting my grandparents who lived in rural tennessee. there was a big open garden\field next to the house. sometime in the afternoon (well before dusk), i walked out to the mailbox, approximately 200 yards from the house. as i was getting the mail from the box, i looked up and saw an object slowly moving from left to right across the field. it was high, but i can't say how high. not as high as a plane would have been. the best way for me to describe the shape (i have never been able to accurately describe it) was like a square capital j, with the bottom part being wider than the side. there were multi-colored lights running along the bottom edge, flashing and looked like they were moving across the bottom. i stood for several minutes and watched as the object moved to the right (which would be north, northwest) and then stopped. i watched it as it stood still for several minutes and then it was gone. i'm not sure i had any specific thoughts of what it could be. i knew it wasn't a plane or anything else i had ever seen. my father worked at an airport, so i was always around differnt aircraft, and this was something new to me. i very much remember watching it in a sort of detached way, i just didn't know those words back then. since that time i have been drawn to stories of unidentified objects. i didn't see it speed off, and all these years i have assumed it disappeared. i haven't related this story to many people, and most think i was imagining things.
